meanings.definition: A jacket worn for casual or semi-formal occasions.
meanings.sent1: He wore a stylish sportcoat to the party.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new sportcoat for the wedding.
meanings.sent3: The sportcoat looked too big for the tiny dog to wear.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was his sportcoat in social situations.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sportcoat stood out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: He will sportcoat his best attire for the presentation.
meanings.sent2: She always sportcoats a suit for important meetings.
meanings.sent3: The CEO decided to sportcoat a tuxedo for the staff meeting.
meanings.sent4: In his mind, he sportcoated success with every button of his jacket.
meanings.sent5: She sportcoated professionalism with her tailored sportcoat.

meanings.definition: The sportcoat was hanging in the closet.
meanings.sent1: I found his favorite sportcoat hanging neatly in the closet.
meanings.sent2: The vintage sportcoat was carefully hung on a wooden hanger.
